spot.title: SPOT Exchange Migration
spot.description: Full migration from 7-year qooxdoo legacy to React to resolve rising maintenance costs and feature development delays

detail.overview: Fully migrated ProBit Global's core SPOT trading platform from a 7-year-old qooxdoo-based legacy system to a modern React + TypeScript architecture. Maintained complex trading functionalities including real-time price data, order systems, and charts while significantly improving developer productivity and user experience.
tasks: Optimized WebSocket-based real-time price/order book data processing and implemented reconnection logic
Established server state management and caching strategies using Tanstack Query
Designed and implemented dark mode and custom color theme system
Integrated and customized TradingView chart library
Implemented real-time order book data-based Depth Chart
Improved order form UX and implemented real-time validation logic
Implemented Mobile responsive layout and Simple/Pro mode switching feature

p2p.title: P2P Trading Service
p2p.description: Designed and built real-time P2P trading platform for business expansion and competitive positioning
achievements: Led entire frontend from design to release

detail.overview: Led the entire frontend development from design to release for a P2P trading platform enabling direct fiat and cryptocurrency transactions between users. Built a secure and reliable trading environment through real-time communication and multi-factor authentication systems.
tasks: Established and applied Next.js-based SSR/ISR rendering strategies
Designed multi-communication architecture using WebSocket, SSE, and Axios
Developed entire frontend for ad creation/management, trading, and chat systems
Designed and implemented multi-factor 2FA system including Passkey and OTP
Designed UI/UX for trade status management and dispute resolution

kyc.title: KYC Identity Verification
kyc.description: Self-developed identity verification service using AWS Rekognition
achievements: Applied AI tools for structure and design

detail.overview: Internalized the identity verification system that previously relied on external KYC solutions using AWS Rekognition and Amplify Liveness. Actively utilized AI tools to improve development efficiency and designed a user-friendly verification flow.
tasks: Implemented facial recognition authentication using AWS Rekognition Face Liveness
Developed ID card capture and OCR data extraction process
Planned and implemented 3-step verification flow (ID → Face Auth → Final Confirmation)
Introduced AI-based development workflow using Claude Code and Figma MCP

eazel.title: Eazel Web Service Renewal
eazel.description: Complete renewal from vanilla JS to Next.js to resolve tech debt and improve performance

detail.overview: Led the major tech stack transition in the complete renewal of Eazel's global art platform web service. Significantly improved search exposure and user experience through SEO optimization and performance improvements.
tasks: Transitioned entire service architecture to Next.js
Improved code stability and developer productivity by introducing TypeScript
Implemented real-time chat functionality using socket.io
Built payment system with Stripe SDK integration
Increased search index by 475% through SEO optimization
Achieved FCP under 1 second through performance optimization
